Tool.Description: Refresh the currently selected layer

Tool.Description: Specify the appearance and behavior of the selected layer

Tool.Description: Zoom to the selected layer

Tool.Description: Opens the attribute table for the selected layer

Tool.Description: Filters the features in the selected layer based on an attribute query

Tool.Description: Removes the selected layer from the map

Tool.Description: Select all the features in the currently selected layer

Tool.Description: Zoom to the currently selected features

Tool.Description: Clear the selected features from the currently selected layer

Tool.Description: Find features near the current selection

Tool.Description: Show records for all features in the current layer
